comments: Bridges (CHA) jumps forward into Hayes' (NOP) body and initiates contact to his arm prior to making any contact with the ball.
Rozier (CHA) is already in Hayes' (NOP) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Rozier (CHA) brings his hands towards Alvarado's (NOP) body and marginal contact occurs as Rozier releases to the perimeter.
Plumlee (CHA) is already in Alvarado's (NOP) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Plumlee (CHA) is already in Alvarado's (NOP) path and is firming up when contact occurs.
Valanciunas (NOP) brings his hand towards Rozier's (CHA) front and marginal contact occurs as Rozier gathers the ball.
Hayes (NOP) legally contests Washington's (CHA) driving shot attempt.
Valanciunas (NOP) is already in Ball's (CHA) path and is firming up when contact occurs.
Rozier (CHA) briefly grasps McCollum's (NOP) arm and marginal contact occurs prior to McCollum's gather.
Ball (CHA) loses control of the ball and does not pin the ball to his hip as he resumes his dribble.
Rozier (CHA) places his hand momentarily on Alvarado's (NOP) side and immediately removes his hand.
Martin (CHA) brushes McCollum's (NOP) off arm and marginal contact occurs prior to McCollum's gather.
Martin (CHA) moves slightly forward towards McCollum (NOP) and marginal contact occurs during the shot attempt.
Bridges (CHA) is already in Alvarado's (NOP) path and marginal contact occurs as he releases away from the contact.
The play originates outside of the LDB.  Plumlee (CHA), the secondary defender on the play, does not establish a legal guarding position outside the RA prior to the contact from Alvarado (NOP).
Plumlee (CHA) is already in Alvarado's (NOP) path and does not deliver contact as the defenders switch.
Alvarado (NOP) places his hand momentarily on Plumlee's (CHA) side before immediately removing his hand.
Washington (CHA) cleanly deflects the ball as McCollum (NOP) attempts to pass.
